      • firstEffect

        public void firstEffect(GameBoard gameBoard,
                        Player attacker,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Player> defenders,
                        int[] coordinates)
                 throws ErrorEffectException,
                        DamageTrackException
        Deal 2 damage to 1 target you can see.
        Specified by:
        firstEffect in class AbstractWeaponCard
        Parameters:
        gameBoard - is the Gameboard where players play
        attacker - is the player who use Weapon card
        defenders - are players attacked
        coordinates - some coordinates used to move players or to indicate squares to attack players
        Throws:
        ErrorEffectException - there is a problem during effect
        DamageTrackException - there is a problem with Damage Track

        Deal 1 damage to a second target that your first target can see. You have to pay a BLUE cube.

        public void thirdEffect(GameBoard gameBoard,
                        Player attacker,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Player> defenders,
                        int[] coordinates)
                 throws ErrorEffectException
        Deal 2 damage to a third target that your second target can see. You have to pay a BLUE cube. You cannot use this effect unless you first use the chain reaction
